title: Update Signature Transformative Work links and add Fancy Studios card

requirements.text: In the “Signature Transformative Work” section (frontend/src/components/sections/SelectedSignalsSection.tsx), update the “ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC” card so its link is https://luma.com/jl85cn4t and enable the automatic link preview for this card using the same URL.

quotes:
1. ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC
The view should show this - https://luma.com/jl85cn4t

And the open link should be in open new tab - https://luma.com/jl85cn4t

acceptanceCriteria: The “ROLLAPPS ON SOLANA — EthCC” card renders a LinkPreview using https://luma.com/jl85cn4t (i.e., showPreview is enabled and link is the luma.com URL).
Clicking the card’s “Open” action opens https://luma.com/jl85cn4t in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

requirements.text: In the “Signature Transformative Work” section (frontend/src/components/sections/SelectedSignalsSection.tsx), add a new card adjacent to (i.e., next to, within the same grid as) the “COINTELEGRAPH — Opinion Contributor” card with: title “FANCY STUDIOS — Gaming Creativity”, italic category/subtitle “Blockchain gaming”, description “Built the marketing function from 0→1, defining strategy, processes across content, design, PR, and community.”, and link https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper. The new card displays an italic category line exactly “Blockchain gaming”.
The new card description text matches exactly: “Built the marketing function from 0→1, defining strategy, processes across content, design, PR, and community.”
The new card renders a LinkPreview using https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper.
Clicking the new card’s “Open” action opens https://fancy-studios.gitbook.io/whitepaper in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

Do not change global navigation, hero section, About, Contact, or other sections.
